scripts.start: npm run build && npm run electron-tsc
scripts.start:prod: npm run build -- -c prod && npm run electron-tsc
scripts.electron-tsc: tsc -p src/electron && npm run electron dist/electron/electron.js
scripts.package:win: npm run build && cross-var electron-packager dist $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --platform=win32 --arch=all --overwrite
scripts.package:linux: npm run build && cross-var electron-packager dist $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --platform=linux --arch=all --overwrite
scripts.package:osx: npm run build && cross-var electron-packager dist $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --platform=darwin --arch=all --overwrite
scripts.package:all: npm run build && cross-var electron-packager dist $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version --out=packages --all --arch=all --overwrite
